title: A Burns for All Seasons
description: Selected from the Springfield Film Festival, the fictional life of Charles Montgomery Burns, described as “Pure egotism.”
altHero: Mr. Burns, wearing a sombrero, rides a horse and raises a cane with open-mouthed excitement
alt1: a crowd in a Mexican village (including a man in a bumble bee costume) cheer on Mr. Burns
alt2: a man points at the heart of a small boy, his finger glowing green and bright
alt3: Mr. Burns walks up a ramp on to a spaceship as a boy watches
alt4: a man lays in the desert sand at the feet of Mr. Burns who is standing in a God-like beam of light
